body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

spack install py-dask-ml



### Information on your system

several architectures

### Additional information

maintainer @adamjstewart

no version satisfies the package's specifications.  It seems that the versioning used by spack is obsolete.
the py-dask-ml package in the built-in repo specifies version '1.8.0'
while the current versioning convention is in the shape 'v2021.11.30'

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: py-dask-ml unsatisfyable
